name: lilting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A lilting voice or tune gently rises and falls in a way that is pleasant to listen to.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a voice or a piece of music) rising and falling in a regular or rhythmic way: "It’s about time you showed up," he says to Eddie in a lilting, teasing voice.
